name: Shaving the Beard
description:
Today was a sad day. Having bought a new beard trimmer, I set it to the max setting and shaved away at my joyous beard. Stupidly, I hadnt checked just how long the max setting was, and now I look like Ive just started growing it! Your task, given a beard represented as an arrayof arrays, is to trim the beard as follows: ['|', 'J', '|', '|'],
['|', '|', '|', 'J'],
['...', '...', '...', '...'];
To trim the beard use the following rules:
trim any curled hair --> replace 'J' with '|' trim any hair from the chin (last array) --> replace '|' or 'J' with '...' All sub arrays will be same length. Return the corrected array of arrays
